body:
Hello everyone, I am sorry for my recent inactivity for the past few weeks. My current house does not have wifi, which makes it impossible to actually get on minecraft. Also, I have been extremely busy working and sailing. I know my inactivity is inexcusable, so I would just like to apologize to everyone about it. This may continue for a few more weeks as summer progresses. I cant give an estimated time I will be back. 
Sorry,
Max

title: Inactivity
